amendment.description: To apply the disclosure requirements to settlements between agencies and private entities and require information regarding the use of funds collected under settlement agreements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2668 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2668 proposed by Senator Lankford for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S6851; text: CR S6851) To apply the disclosure requirements to settlements between agencies and private entities and require information regarding the use of funds collected under settlement agreements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2668 proposed by Senator Lankford for Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2668 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
